meta.title: Power Solutions for Every City Need | Humble Rentals
meta.description: From weekly farmers markets to annual festivals, we deliver reliable power without the operational complexity.

hero.title: Power Solutions for Every City Need
hero.description: From weekly farmers markets to annual festivals, we deliver reliable power without the operational complexity.

items.title: Farmers Markets
items.description: Weekly or seasonal power for vendors. 30kWh typical capacity, weekly service schedule, zero generator noise and emissions.

items.title: City Events
items.description: Festivals, concerts, and community gatherings. Scalable capacity, multi-point power distribution, event coordination included.

items.title: Public Works
items.description: Field crews, parks, and construction sites. Daily deployments to 100+ job sites, flexible scheduling, no fuel logistics.

items.title: Emergency Backup
items.description: Resilience planning and emergency operations. Rapid deployment capability, reliable backup power, no fuel logistics.

commonUses.title: Common Use Cases
list: Vendor power at farmers markets and street fairs
Stage and sound power at concerts and festivals
Bounce houses and inflatables at community events

capacity.title: Understanding Your Power Needs
capacity.cta: Need help calculating? We provide free load assessments.

items.title: Proven Track Record
items.description: Over 500 deployments since 2022 across 100+ job sites, including City of Bell municipal contract and major events like CicLAvia.

items.title: Zero Operational Burden
items.description: We handle all logistics, maintenance, and charging. Your staff focuses on events and community services, not battery management.

items.title: Flexible Solutions
items.description: From weekly farmers markets to annual festivals, we scale to your needs with adaptable pricing and deployment models.

items.title: Complete Logistics
items.description: Delivery, setup, placement, and pickup handled by our trained team for every deployment.

items.title: 24/7 Support
items.description: Real-time monitoring during events with emergency response and backup units if needed.

items.title: Full Maintenance
items.description: All charging, testing, and battery maintenance handled at our facility between deployments.

items.title: Free Load Assessment
items.description: We help you calculate power needs and design the right solution for your specific use case.
